text: Bella Rochel Fraynd (27 August 1911 – 12 February 1994), known as Rahela Ferari, was a Serbian actress who appeared in more than ninety films from 1951 to 1993. She was of Ashkenazi (Jewish) origin. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! title: Rahela Ferari
